message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $15,000 is a bit above my budget.  I'm interested in the product, but I can only go up to $10,500. Let me know what you think.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  While I value your interest, the product is worth more to me than $10,500. Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
Alice, I understand you value the product, but $13,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $11,500. This is my final offer. If we can't agree on this price, I'll have to look elsewhere.
